website_summaries.verdict: The feedback for the Ultraboost S&L has been overwhelmingly positive. People liked this Adidas running shoe for being suitable for their daily activities. The comfortable midsole, the eye-catching design, and the premium quality are apparently the aspects that made the shoe as complete as can be. On the other hand, some consumers have deemed the overall hug of the shoe’s outline to be looser than usual.Neutral pronators and those who enjoy the thrill of taking to the roads are the ones who are welcome to use the Adidas Ultraboost S&L.
pros: Consumers generally like the colorful hues that grace the façade of the Adidas Ultraboost S&L
Several testers have lauded the comfort given by the midsole unit of this running shoe
The suede panel system gives a premium look and delivers extra oomph to the fit-adjustment capacity of the upper, according to most reviewers
Some users have given praise to the reflective element on the upper for being a visual indicator during those nighttime runs
Based on many reviews, the lightweight construction of the Ultraboost S&L has allowed all-day wear
The outsole unit is praised for having the capability to handle movement on the ground
people have observed that brakes, swerves, and steps are easy because of the Continental™ rubber
cons: A handful of consumers have felt that the in-shoe experience is a bit loose
they recommend sizing down when getting a pair

customer_reviews.title: item is fake!!!!
customer_reviews.text: item didn't come in a box just a bag and the tags were not true adidas tags, but all Chinese writing!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee S. Reiners

customer_reviews.title: What a pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Timely shipping and showed up in good condition. The shoes fit, they are comfortable, I think they really look good and they have exceptional traction plus purchased for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Wow.....
customer_reviews.text: Years and years shoes after shoes I found the perfect pair ,The best running shoes ever owend ultraboost
customer_reviews.author: Carlos tellez

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe and fits better than any other shoe I have ever had. A very good looking shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Kelly

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice , and comfortable but it is tight from the ankle .
customer_reviews.author: abdullrazaq aldeei

customer_reviews.title: Fitness and design!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about it! One of the best that adidas has made!
customer_reviews.author: ERIC REYES

customer_reviews.title: By from a reputable company
customer_reviews.text: My husband has only worn these a few RH w and the soles are detaching. Was told by this company to contact ADIDAS.. Awful service... buy from someone else.
customer_reviews.author: AC313

customer_reviews.title: BEST SHOES EVER MADE
customer_reviews.text: SHOES ARE VERY COMFORTABLE SO COMFORTABLE THAT I HAD TO ORDER A 2ND PAIR A WEEK LATER.. I LOVE THESE SHOES...
customer_reviews.author: Roberto  Las Vegas

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: This might be the most comfortable shoe I’ve ever owned. If I could find other colors in my size I would definitely buy again. The shipping was very fast too
customer_reviews.author: Kjfrank

customer_reviews.title: SUPER Comfortable.  Great on long runs
customer_reviews.text: So glad to get these shoes. Best in Class. So comfortable on long run days.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: Fast and perfect
customer_reviews.text: I like how fast it was shipped. There’s nothing to compare with Adidas
customer_reviews.author: essa

product_meta.title: adidas Ultraboost S&L Shoes Men's
product_meta.description: Performance running shoes with sneakerhead style. These men's shoes update the Ultraboost legacy for a best-ever feeling on every run. They have a breathable mesh upper with suede details. The flexible outsole works with the responsive midsole for a smooth and energized ride.
feature_bullets: Outer Material: synthetic, suede, and leather
